fields.headline: The festival
fields.bodyText: The Cutty Sark may have gone up in smoke, but five other tall ships, including the Grand Turk, The Zebu and The Matthew of Bristol, will make a dramatic entrance at the port of Whitehaven in Cumbria for the Whitehaven International Maritime Festival next weekend. Guests can also ride a hovercraft, relax in the psychedelic environment of the Colourscope Gallery and enjoy music, drama, theatre and pyrotechnic displays. See thefestival.org.uk.
